1.content: Welcome to the beginning of this story. Now go on and pick the character you want to start things. Starting with the office trio, Retsuko, Fenneko, and Haida.
1.title: Characters

choices: Overworking causes her to stress eat. A lot.
Retsuko overeats after finally having a few days off.
Feeling too small, Retsuko gains weight to feel bigger.
11.content: The red panda that hates her job, sings death metal, and is the main character. That's Retsuko for ya. How does she put on?
11.title: Retsuko

112.content: Retsuko walked down the street rubbing her grumbling stomach. Unbeknownst to most of her friends the little red panda had a big appetite, able to put away massive meals in a single sitting without discomfort. Right now said appetite with bothering her and she was desperate to find something to fill her stomach with. Eventually her interest was piqued by...
112.title: Retsuko has some 'aggressive' eating ha...

choices: Go to the bathroom and relieve some "stress"
Let herself and still eating until her dress burst open
1122.content:
"McFoxy" It was on big white letter over the red background on top of said restaurant. Something about that name was oddly familiar, but she gave little to no thought about it; at this point, her guts were stronger than her brain.

As she enters the restaurant, a nice soft jingle played in the background, only obscured by the sound of teenagers yelling and people talking on their sits. Nothing out of the ordinary for these kind of places.

She rushes to one of those electronic kiosks where people are gathered to make her order:

"Let's see... two cheeseburgers, three sets of jumbo fries, two large sodas, ehm... f-five BigFox? Hmmm... maybe this is a little bit too much food, I'm really hungry, but I'm not sure I'll eat all of these.. two sets of chicken nuggets and a cesar salad" She ended her train of thought with a bit of hesitation.

She brought all the food to her table; it looked like she was waiting for some friends to show up to eat for her. It couldn't be farther from the truth. She couldn't wait to dig into the greasy warm food, but she'd look like a pig to the rest of the clients, they were already giving her some weird looks. But, red like a tomato and sweating like his boss, trying not to lose control of her own actions, she can't take it no more and starts to dig into the food. Stuffing burger after burger, helping it go down with the large soda and refilling her mouth with the jumbo fries. Moaning inbetween meals as she feels her stomach fill. She hadn't enjoyed eating that much in a very long time.

She was about to finish the meal when she was forced to stop by a sudden pressure on her gut; her uniform, it was at it's limit. Her now round belly was being restricted by the tight clothes she was wearing. She came to her senses, turning bright red. Her embarrassment was only fueled by a loud burp that came out of nowhere; and the worst thing, she still wasn't satisfied; she wanted to stuff her face with more food, break her dress and let her stomach spill out
1122.title: A fast food place.

choices: Retsuko has always been on the heavy side
She hears that Resasuke is into big girls
115.content: Let's see what other ways this red panda can gain some excess weight!
115.title: Some more options.

1152.content: Is Resasuke actually into bigger girls?
1152.title: She hears that Resasuke is into big girls

choices: Fenneko becomes a foodie. A HUGE one.
Fenneko gains a sweet teeth for certain treats.
Fenneko binges and Retsuko, being a doormat, doesn't help.
Fenneko attempts to hang out with Tsunoda. A food spots.
12.content: The office smart fennec fox that's always on her phone and her trolling laugh. How does she pack on the pounds?
12.title: Fenneko

choices: Haida hears Retsuko might be into 'big' guys.
He joins a eating contest with the guys from work.
Haida tried to bulk up, but the wrong way.
13.content: The tall hyena that happens to be a good boy and have a huge crush on Retsuko. How does the hyena put on weight.
13.title: Haida

choices: Seeing an ultra gaining powder on tv
134.content:
Haida laid in bed after getting a break from work. He could come back any time during the week, but not any later, so he had at least some time before working again. Everyone he hung out with was at work though. Retsuko was doing her job as well, making any attempt at a date impossible. He didn't have much besides his place.

He decided to at least better himself, but didn't really know how other than working out. This could also get Retsuko's attention. Seeing as he was tall and lanky, most would be right about him never picking up weights in his life. He didn't know how to build muscle at all. He decided to look up how while also texting Fenneko to see if she knew.

All he could find for a first step was all diet related. Most of it was a lot of food. He had never even seen that much before in his life. He at least got a text back from his Fenneko about this.

"You are working out? Since when?"

"Look, I have nothing else better to do and I could use time to better myself."

"It's for Retsuko, isn't it..."

"Is it that obvious?"

"Look, all I know is you eat a lot and work out. Why did you even ask me about this?"

He stopped the conversation there with a blush. "Looks like I have some training to do..." he said while...
134.title: Haida tried to bulk up... keyword: tried

choices: Haida runs into Retsuko or another character of your choice on the way out
Haida either cannot make it to or talks himself out of going to the gym
Haida makes it to the gym
1343.content:
Haida splayed out on his couch with a sigh. He wasn’t really sure where to begin with this. Just going to a restaurant, throwing himself into his fridge and pantry? That all seemed contradictory to getting in shape. All that stuff was bad for you, right? He turned his head to the TV to relax a bit. After a couple of hours, he was starting to forget the whole idea.

“Ultra Supplement Market dot com!”

The booming voice of an ad jolted him out of indifference. He was paying close attention to the TV now. A shirtless lion with rippling muscles stood tall in the center of television screen, staring Haida down.

“Have you ever wanted to get into shape but didn’t know where to start?”

Haida sat up now and leaned closer to the screen. This was the information he needed.

“Head over to Ultra Supplement Market dot com and find the vitamins and minerals you need to build up your new rockin’ bod!”

The camera panned from the lion to a fox that was just as built as the lion.

“Before I went to Ultra Supplement Market dot com I was a lanky dork!”

A “before” picture of the fox flashed on the screen. Haida gasps. That fox used to look almost exactly like him! And yet that fox was before him now with a washboard stomach and huge biceps. Haida jumped from the couch and took off towards his room to grab his laptop before the commercial ended.

Haida quickly started up his laptop and entered the address from the ad. Finding a page that was basically what the address described. A large marketplace of various nutritional powders, vitamins, and mineral capsules. What was he looking for? The fox on TV said something about bulking powders. Haida looked them up to find a lot of them. There were low carb and “meal replacement” powders that were quite expensive. On the lower end of the price spectrum, there were mixtures of various vitamins and minerals that contained 3,000 calories per serving. This was closer to Haida’s price range.

“3,000 calories… how many calories were you supposed to get in a day again? Probably less than that…” he thought aloud. “And some of them come in flavors like vanilla or chocolate, but that doesn’t seem right. Then again, this is in a fitness store. Eating 3,000 calories of a vitamin and mineral blend is probably different than 3,000 calories worth of microwave noodles.” Satisfied with this justification, Haida placed an order. His order would arrive in two days, just in time for the weekend.

The next two days of work were uneventful. He came in, did his work, talked with Retsuko and Fenneko, then went home. He never discussed this plan with Fenneko in the meantime. And she just assumed that he had given up another plan to win Retsuko over without really trying once again.

When Haida came home from work that Friday, a box was waiting for him. He cheered to himself and placed the box on the coffee table. Ripping it open to reveal it’s contents, two huge plastic jars filled with the supplement powder. He wrapped his arms around one of the jars and took it to the kitchen. “So, if I’m understanding correctly. I mix this into a shake to drink after meals. Then once I’ve done this for awhile I start working out.

After a sizable takeout dinner, Haida returned to the powder in the kitchen. Making a shake as best he could, perhaps using more protein powder than the recommended serving size. Though the shake came out looking pretty sorry, Haida seemed to mostly get it right. “Hey, this is actually pretty good!” the hyena said upon taking a sip. He quickly finished the shake up, and felt immensely full. “Well, this might be easier than I thought.” He slept easy after that.

The next day was a typical Saturday for Haida, aside from fitting the shakes into his schedule. He hung out at home most of the time, as he didn’t have a lot of friends outside work. Sunday was largely similar. Though Haida helped himself to an extra shake or two. Finding that they were actually really good.

Haida woke up on Monday morning, with the weekend having come and gone, he started to prepare for work and found himself having some difficulty with it. First, it took him a bit of going to get his shirt buttons done up. The bottom two just did not seem to want to go through the holes. But without thinking much on it, he sucked his gut in and managed to get buttoned up. Then the button on his pants gave Haida some trouble as well, but not quite as much as the shirt, all it took was a bit of gumption to get that. After a quick breakfast and an after breakfast protein shake, Haida went to the bathroom to brush his teeth and freshen up a bit before work.

Haida jumped back when he saw himself in the mirror. With a second chin and two soft cheeks staring back at him, it was impossible to ignore that he had gotten fat. He lloked down to see his softer belly hanging over the waistband of his pants and straining against his work shirt, he figured that he had to have gained at least 20 pounds. “Alright… no big deal. Must be time to start hitting the gym. I’ll just… get there after work.”

*Huff!* *Puff!* Haida ran for the train. Perspiration had pooled under his armpits and he found himself gasping to catch his breath while his heart pounded against his chest. But he caught his train at least. Even if it was more crowded than ever before and it wasn’t a pleasant ride. In addition to being cramped, he could practically feel the eyes of other passengers traveling over him. But Haida knew that this wasn’t going to be the worst part of his work day. That would be getting through the day without Retsuko noticing that he had gained weight.

*Crrrk* the office chair automatically lowered itself when it’s occupants more burdensome weight filled the seat. Fenneko’s laughter filled Haida’s ears. He winced. “What’s… all this?” she asked, clearly still bemused, making a motion as though she were going over the curve of a belly. “I-I’m working out! We talked about this!” Fenneko blinked. “You’re still doing that?” Haida nodded, his second chin swaying. “Of course… even if Retsuko doesn’t notice me for the effort, I think I should still try and improve myself.” Fenneko was clearly still amused, but listening. “Right…” Haida continues. “But still… could you help me avoid Retsuko. You know, keep her occupied, maybe go somewhere else for lunch.” Fenneko laughs again. “I can try. But I can’t guarantee she won’t notice all of you.” Haida’s fuller cheeks turned an indignant dark red. He couldn’t find a comeback, so he shut up and started his work. Knowing that Fenneko meant it, even if she joked.

As the day went on, the plan was going well. Haida kept his distance, and he didn’t run into Retsuko. He kept his head down and poured himself into his work so much that most of his other co-workers didn’t notice either. However, he may have raised a few eyebrows at lunch. When Haida finished his meal and found that he was left unsatisfied, he remembered that he left the protein powder at home. He knew that maybe he should avoid it. But after taking in so many calories, his capacity had increased so much. Haida couldn’t help but head for the vending machines and scrounge up a small fest of snacks. The glutting went surprisingly unnoticed, as everyone mostly kept to their own table. However Haida’s overeating overburdened his already out stretched shirt and he found an oval of soft flab parting the space between two buttons and exposing itself. Haida hurried back to his desk, hoping that no one noticed.

With that being his only mishap, Haida was feeling pretty good as the end of the day approached. He kept an eye on the clock while finishing up his work and packing up.
1343.title: Haida bulks up

choices: Retsuko goes missing and Haida must find her
135.title: Other choices.

choices: Haida pays a visit for Fenneko to find more details
Haida goes into the countryside aimlessly
1351.content:
And Retsuko was gone. One moment she was being bossed around like always, the next moment she was throwing her stack of papers into the air, announcing that she was quitting in the most epic way thought possible, storming out of the building like some slave that was set free after years of captivity.

No one knew what to say or think after this.

Despite being overlooked and treated like a robot by everyone, there was a cold void after Retsuko left that could not be filled.

They tried to find her, to talk some sense into her (though, they highly doubt that she would be hired back by her literal pig of a boss, who was facing his own existential crisis after someone stood up to him like that for the first time in all of his life), but Retsuko was impossible to find; her phone was dead and she was not home in her cramp apartment.

Naturally, they turned to her best friend, Fenneko, but she was just as clueless as they were. They last thing Retsuko said to her was that she had to get out of Tokyo for a while, to "find her place in the world", though, no one knew exactly what that meant. Fenneko had a feeling that neither did Retsuko.

This worried everyone even more, but there was nothing they could do. But Retsuko's sudden and unexpected departure had the greatest impact in Haida. The hyena was driven to depression. He quitted his job as well, feeling that their was no reason for him to stay there after his crush had left.

And now he was sitting out in the rain, his fur and clothes soaked to the bone, shivering in the cold, but he did not care. The only thoughts he had was of Retsuko. Where had she gone? What was she doing now? How was she sustaining herself?

The worry was driving him crazy. He stood up, a new will blazing in his eyes. He had to find her
1351.title: Retsuko goes missing and Haida must find her

choices: Female pro wrestling and male sumo wrestling.
14.content:
Okay as all three of this show's characters are going to gain weight and get bigger as well, it's time to choose a scenario involving all three characters.

The eating contest: The show's three characters host an eating contest as all three of them are determined to win and earn some bragging rights as well.


Female pro wrestling and Male sumo wrestling: Two out of the show's three main characters mainly the star of the show Aggretsuko who along with Fennoko bulks up and competes in the exciting world of pro wrestling meanwhile Haida bulks himself up and starts training to become a world champion sumo wrestler.

Fantasy situation: All three of the show's main characters imagine themselves as big fat and or giant fat superheroes who battle the forces of evil on a daily basis.

Fantasy situation #2: All three of the show's main characters imagine themselves as gigantic fat monsters whilst trying their absolute best not to terrorize or devour an entire city that they're in.
14.title: A mix of all three.

info.brief_description: The office gang from the Netflix's anime, Aggretsuko, pack on the pounds.
info.description:
The characters from the show Aggretsuko put on weight. You just decide who and how.

Rules:
The character you pick has to be the gainer.
Characters can gain with no limits.
Make the chapters decent.
